facts.seriesTitle: Population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line declined from 17.6 % in 2003 to 1.5% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 1.8 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line declined from 23.2 % in 2007 to 12% in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Bhutan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely stunted (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 33.6 % of children under 5 years of age had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely overweight
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under 5 years of age increased from 4.4 % in 2008 to 7.6% in 2010.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 945 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 148 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 77.7 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 30.8 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 25.8 % of women between 20 to 24 years of age reported having been married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 2 % in 2000 to 8.51% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 34.15 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service—an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 34.92 % in 2000 to 100.0% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 79 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 5.73 % in 2000 to 4.71% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 8.28 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 10.36 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate increased from 1.9 % in 2001 to 2.5% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 98.0 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 35.32 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Bhutan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 8.28 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 10.36 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Bhutan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest increased from 68.37 % in 2000 to 72.28% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 34.28 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 47.33 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the intentional homicide rate was 1.13 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, there were about 99.9 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 1.55 % of GDP, up from 0.25 % in 2006

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (percent)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 2.53 % in 2006 to 11.43% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 2.07 % of the population, up from 0.29% of the population in 2008.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, Bhutan has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
